food.question: I am yellow, and monkeys like to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love to eat me!
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
🤸 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am round and red, and sometimes green. You can bite into me or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved me... maybe a little too much!
💚 I grow on trees.
🥤 You can drink me, or eat me whole.

food.question: I am white, cold, and yummy in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm a yummy treat on a hot day!
🥶 I stay in the freezer.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me, or a cone to hold me.

food.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyes.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. You can find me with carrots and corn. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass!
🌱 I grow on a plant.
🥣 I'm often in mixed vegetables.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I can be sliced and toasted, or used to make a sandwich. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.
🍞 I often come in a loaf.
🔥 You can put me in the toaster.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 You can pour me into a glass.
🥣 I make your cereal taste yummy.

food.question: I am a yellow citrus fruit, but I am not a banana. You can make juice with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 I am yellow and sour.
🍹 You can squeeze me for a drink!
🎂 I'm a popular flavor for cake!

food.question: I am made from potatoes, but I'm not a baked potato. I am long and crispy and often eaten with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am a popular side dish.
🧂 I'm usually salty.
🥔 I start as a potato.

food.question: I am made from cocoa beans. I can be dark, milk, or white. Many people like me as a treat, especially for dessert. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am sweet and brown
🌎 I start as a bean on a tree!
🎂 I am often in cake or cookies

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I can be red or black and sometimes live in your house. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small and can be found on the ground
🧺 Sometimes I like to take food back to my home
💪 I can carry things much bigger than myself!

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly around flowers. I love to drink nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
🌷 You can see me in the garden.
🌈 My wings have many colors.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I live in the corners of your house (sometimes!)
🕷️ I have more legs than you do!
🍴 I like to eat flies.

bug.question: I buzz around and make honey. I have a stinger. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I live in a hive.
🌻 I love flowers.
⚫️ I am black and yellow.

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound. I am usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hide in the grass.
🦗 I can jump very far.
🎶 I make music in the summer.

bug.question: I am a small, red bug with black spots. I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am often found on plants.
🔴 My shell is bright.
🍀 Some people think I bring good fortune

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up.
🌙 You only see me when it's dark.
🔥 I am not actually on fire.

bug.question: I live underground in tunnels. I help make the soil healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I live in the dirt.
🪱 Birds like to eat me.
🌱 I help plants grow.

bug.question: I bite and leave itchy bumps. I fly around and like warm weather. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I am small and annoying.
🩸 I drink blood.
🖐️ You try to swat me away.

bug.question: I have large wings with pretty patterns and eat plants. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Some people think I am beautiful.
👑 Some kinds migrate great distances.
🦋 I am like a butterfly, but I usually come out at night.
